metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21136 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In multiple functions of JobStore.java, there is a possible way to cause a crash on startup due to improper input validation. This could lead to local denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-246542285

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
